document.full_text: a decorous, respectable adaptation of sara gruen's engaging best-seller, "water for elephants" would have come more excitingly alive with stronger doses of depression-era grit and sexual spunk.
document.title: "water for elephants" a lost opportunity
lines_and_colors: a decorous, respectable adaptation of sara gruen's engaging best-seller, "water for elephants" would have come more excitingly alive with stronger doses of depression-era grit and sexual spunk.
